name: Once Upon A Misfortune
description:
Once upon a time, there was a rebellious princess and her stuffy advisor. Or maybe a far-sighted advisor and his decidedly too reckless superior? Whatever, perspectives.

More importantly, this is a fairytale of bickering and blushing, fine drinks, distress and danger, ass-saving, a Manual of Great Importance and... What the heck are all these dragonflies doing here? 

Have fun with this Choose Your Own Adventure-Story and get to know Indira and Alex while they face one of their most difficult challenges yet: How to work together with only one shared brain cell (and decidedly too much chaos) to save their Kingdom.
